price: 116. Nabii Muusa baababak isin Qambisa keenik iyye, tokkel usun sinni Akootaa kee coox Qambisen waqdi, sinam intiital baabeeniih kaxxa meesissoh ken meesiiseeniih suwaawuruh nummâ waarra keenit celsiiseeniih usun kaxxa baab luk yemeeten.
arabic: قَالَ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla alqū falammā alqaw saḥarū aʿyuna al-nāsi wa-is'tarhabūhum wajāū bisiḥ'rin ʿaẓīmin
